TEXT.TITLE: WILLCOX AND GIBBS <WG> TO MAKE ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Willcox and Gibbs Inc said it has agreed to acquire Atlantia electric parts distributor B and W Electric Supply Co for an undisclosed amount of cash. B and W had sales of about eight mln dlrs in its most recent year. Willcox said it plans further expansion in the Atlanta area. Reuter
